ovdesc.p: This file is used to display all forward entries generated by a transaction input. Each entry id will have the prefix 'F' to indicate that the account update has not yet occurred.

desc.p: A maximum of 35 characters may be entered.

Statement Entry Id's which have been generated by the contract. These will be postfixed with a backslash character '\', and the company mnemonic of the account to which the entry relates, which can be different to the company that originated the contract.
Entry Id followed by '\' followed by Company Mnemonic. (Internal file, no input)
The transaction reference number of the originating contract.
1-20 Type A Alphanumeric characters. (Internal file, no input)
